description: Backup/Restore Load Test - Case 2: Incorrect DWOC Configuration (Typo in Registry)

custom_tests.name: backup_500_incorrect_config
custom_tests.args: --mode binary --max-vus 200 --max-devworkspaces 500 --delete-devworkspace-after-ready false --separate-namespaces true --devworkspace-ready-timeout-seconds 1800 --test-duration-minutes 30 --run-backup-test-hook true --dwoc-config-type incorrect --registry-path quay.io/CHANGEME --registry-secret quay-push-secret --backup-wait-minutes 30
custom_tests.description: 500 workspaces with backup testing - incorrect DWOC config (medium scale)

custom_tests.name: backup_2000_incorrect_config
custom_tests.args: --mode binary --max-vus 300 --max-devworkspaces 2000 --delete-devworkspace-after-ready false --separate-namespaces true --devworkspace-ready-timeout-seconds 3000 --test-duration-minutes 50 --run-backup-test-hook true --dwoc-config-type incorrect --registry-path quay.io/CHANGEME --registry-secret quay-push-secret --backup-wait-minutes 45
custom_tests.description: 2000 workspaces with backup testing - incorrect DWOC config (production scale)
